name: NSPressureConfiguration
desc: An encapsulation of the behavior and progression of a Force Touch trackpad as it responds to specific events.

items.name: init(pressureBehavior: NSEvent.PressureBehavior)
items.desc: Initializes a pressure configuration object with a specified pressure behavior.

items.name: func set()
items.desc: Changes the pressure configuration of the trackpad to the initialized pressure configuration.

items.name: var pressureBehavior: NSEvent.PressureBehavior
items.desc: The pressure behavior of the pressure configuration object.
